about_the_game:
Fractured Core is a cyberpunk JRPG set in 2105 Germany. Play as Michael, a Raven Operator of ATHENA Private Security Company as he undertake various missions that set him on a journey to uncover the truth that was hidden throughout history.



  • EXPLORE THE WORLD, TAKE YOUR TIME - As a Raven Operator, you can take on different side missions from people from all walk of life. From a pedestrian on the street to the higher ups of a corporation, you decide whether you want to help them or ignore their needs.

  • VARIETY OF MOD CHIPS & PSIONICS TO CHOOSE - Each playable characters in the game has different proficiency in psionics. Harness the 6 elements of the world, level up the characters to unlock powerful skills, and modify your weapons and armors so it can slice through heaven. The characters grows as you continue your journey through the glamorous and the gritty Germany.

  • CLASSIC TURN BASE BATTLE RE-WORKED - Engage in Turn Based Battle throughout your journey, simple enough to understand but deep enough to experiment with various character builds.
